radiographic_examinations.findings: Markedly asymmetric lung opacities located predominantly in the central portion of the right upper lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistent asymmetric lung opacities; new septal lines, increased thickening of the right minor fissure, and increased perihilar haziness noted 5 hours after initial imaging.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased perivascular haziness diffusely with a more widespread distribution of the previously seen opacities, which remained most dense in the right upper lobe; new blunting of the left costophrenic angle noted.
Increased perivascular haziness diffusely; trace residual mitral regurgitation post-surgery.
